message.body: They must be the cutests when they sleep. I actually had a budget review meeting today and had to do some work on it. Just finished now. Yourself?
I love babies, but if I had to watch them as much as you do, I may get annoyed. Lol.

They are! And we're pretty happy when they sleep since we would get a little break. Oh man, Working on a Saturday. What a trooper you are! I just got home, tired. Might have to babysit again tomorrow for a bit. So that's pretty much my weekend hahah.
I have such little energy right now. And i'm not even there every day hahah! I have to give it to my sisters and to all parents in general. I love babies too but it's exhausting.
Of of course. Gotta give it to all parents. Lots of work.
Steve can I ask you something?
As always.

So I met this guy at my friend's birthday party and we talked here and there. It was mostly joking around, you know, party conversation. He's since contacted me and we've been talking for a few days. I know he's interested but you know how I am right now. I'm just not sure about this stuff and I'm not completely sure what I should do...
I don't want to lead some one on. But I don't want to be rude or mean. Like he's seems like a nice person, and it's not personal. I'm just awkward about this stuff.
*he
I think he would be a good friend but I'm not completely sure what to to next.
I don't want to just stop talking to the guy. That would be abrupt. He is nice to talk to. But I don't want it to be miscronstruedz
*misconstrued.
I would just keep talking with him and keep it low key. But if he ever asks to move forward or kinda just hang out alone, then just let him know then.
He wants to hang out but wouldn't that be like a date?
Oh, well that's
What I was thinking. You definitely can, but I would clarify.
He wanted to hang out today but I was babysitting. Then he asked me earlier if I wanted to grab food after I was done but I'm just so tired. And honestly, I want to afraid it coming across as a date.
So I want to ask, do you think it's beat if I nip it in the bud?
Like how would you want this to be handled if you were the guy?
*avoid
*bettet
**better
It's really dependent on the person. Some people don't want to just hang out if they don't have a shot.
I just dread potentially hurting people's feelings.
Sometimes you have too...
